mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NUM AS noticeNum, NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent, NOTICE_PHOTO AS noticePhoto, NOTICE_DATE AS noticeDate, NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE AS noticeModifyDate FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_NUM,NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_PHOTO) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(NOTICE_NUM),0)+1 FROM NOTICE),#{noticeTitle},#{noticeContent},#{noticePhoto})
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NUM AS noticeNum, NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent, NOTICE_PHOTO AS noticePhoto, NOTICE_DATE AS noticeDate, NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE AS noticeModifyDate FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NUM = #{noticeNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE=#{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_CONTENT=#{noticeContent}, NOTICE_PHOTO=#{noticePhoto}, NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE=sysdate WHERE NOTICE_NUM=#{noticeNum}
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE=#{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_CONTENT=#{noticeContent}, NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE=sysdate WHERE NOTICE_NUM=#{noticeNum}
